tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Dental Cleaning,
review:
My experience with this doctor couple has been very refreshing, they are very professional in their approach, they make you feel comfortable by explaining in detail, what the procedure would be like- time, cost, etc, etc. 
I found them friendly and hard working. I have been visiting dentists since 30 years (due to a motorcycle accident as a result of which had cracks in my teeth)and have come across quite a few dentists.

Cost wise they are quite reasonable.
I thank my brother for recommending them to me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Cavities,Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,Tooth Decay,Dental Fillings,
review: Hey,So I initially just went to see a dentist as it had been more than a decade that I visited a dentist and I kind if knew I had issues going on with my teeth. I really had no plans of getting things done yet. Soon as i went there i waited for like 2-3 minutes before getting sanitized to walk in and the doctor was soo friendly and checked everything and gave me advise and also helped me with payment plan as well as explained in detail about the issues going on with my teeth. I was humbled and knew I was at a place where I'm safe to go through the treatment and wallah the next day I got most of my work done and the doctor as well as the helper nurse were great at their work *** **** *** **** ********** A big thank you tooth saviours ü¶∑

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr Mohamed was very reassuring. I just arrived in Bengaluru on a plane from England with a bad toothache. My tooth was loose. The extraction was quick and painless. Dr Mohamed made conversation while we waited for the anaesthetic to work. If ever you visit Bengaluru and you need a dentist I recommend Dr Mohamed

review: I was looking for caring and friendly doctor, but fortunately i got this doctor and during my first phone call itself, doctor has given me confidence & said dont worry. even though its a holiday ! doctor has answered my calls regularly and guided me all the info. very next day i have visited doctor, Doctor was very friendly and caring he spent good time in diagnosing the issue and suggested me to remove my impacted tooth and after a week i have taken a appointment and without any pain doctor and his team removed my impacted tooth and its been 3 days I don't have any surgical pain. if we have such doctors in every field i feel every patient will get better without any medicines or treatment. i hope my jaw pain too will comedown.
